structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.text: The cabinet shall prescribe a plate of practical form and size which shall contain only the registration number and the word "Trailer" and the abbreviation of the word "Kentucky".
law.history: Created 1956 (2nd Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 9, effective January 1, 1957.
